name: Cancel Admit/Visit
description: Cancel admit notification when a previously sent A01 (admit) or A04 (register) event needs to be cancelled
businessPurpose: Cancel a previous admission or registration event due to erroneous entry or decision reversal
timing: Sent immediately after determining that a previous A01 or A04 event should be cancelled
realWorldScenarios: Patient admission cancelled due to bed unavailability
Medical clearance failure cancelling elective admission
Registration cancelled due to insurance verification failure

generationRules.originalTrigger: References original A01 or A04 that is being cancelled
generationRules.requiredDataQuality: High - cancellation accuracy critical for billing and bed management
